title: Aaduladan Padalai Kaettu Lyrics Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva
stanzas:
Aaduladan Padalai Kaettu (remix) Lyrics Motta Shiva Ketta Shiva
#ShankarMahadevan #Padmalatha

You..
Puratichi thalaivar
Ponmana chemmal
makkal thilagam
Doctor MGR-in
kudi irundha kovil song remix
dedicated to all Cinema fans

Aaduladan padalai kaettu
rasipathilethaan
sugam sugam sugam.
ishaa haa haa haa hoi

aasai tharum paarvaiyil
ellaam aayiram ennam
varum varum varum
ishaa ishaa ishaa ishaa hoi

aasai tharum paarvaiyil
ellaam aayiram ennam
varum varum varum

aasai tharum paarvaiyil
ellaam aayiram ennam
varum varum varum

M G rippa rippa ah
people politician
representing the city
of kind
... never forgot it
you're the people
champion
the real ..ever known

kannarugil  penmai kudiyaera
kai azhagil ilamai thadumaara
thennai ilaneeril padhamaaga
ondru naan tharavaa
idhamaaga.

senganiyil thalaivan pasi aara
thindra idam thaenin suvai oora
pangu pera varavaa
thunaiyaaga. ..

manam oonjalin meedhu
poo mazhai thoovida
uriyavan neethaane.

dance to the beat
hit the kicks down
hey shake it to the rhythm
let the pitch count
yei chocolate honey
get the speaker ..
kudiyirundha kovil.
... love

kallirukkum malare
valaindhaadu.
kalaippaara madiyil
idam podu
ullirukkum ninaivil
uravaadu
ulagaiye marandhu
vilaiyaadu....

vimmi varum azhagil
nadaipodu
vandhirukkum manadhai
edai podu
vendiyathai tharalaam
thunivaodu..

un paarvaiyile
naa oorvalam varuven
pudhumaiyai nee paadu.

Aaduladan ah..
Aaduladan  ah..
Aaduladan padalai kaettu
rasipathilethaan
sugam sugam sugam.
ishaa haa haa haa hoi

aasai tharum paarvaiyil
ellaam aayiram ennam
varum varum varum
ishaa ishaa ishaa ishaa hoi

aasai tharum paarvaiyil
ellaam aayiram ennam
varum varum varum
